what i need to make of this … when i have this item in my bag and i click on open i wear it :s

here are the full ints :

if(i == 8334) //ID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "open"; class8.anInt174 = 2450; class8.anInt181 = 1410; class8.anInt190 = 164; class8.anInt198 = 1592; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 3; class8.anInt194 = -6; class8.anInt165 = -1; class8.anInt200 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Strange Casket"; //Name class8.aByteArray178 = "should i open it??".getBytes(); //Description }
